name: Rock Drum Invasion
description:
Incredible Sound Quality. 16 different kits. 100% Pure fun!

Rock Drum Invasion brings the hottest rock drum kits to your iOS device. Plug in your headphones and start jamming. Choose between 16 high quality state of the art drumkits. An easy-to-use interface makes this app real fun for everyone.

Rock Drum Invasion includes an exciting and flexible new range of Rock, Pop, Synth & Funk Drum Kits that can be used in many different musical styles.

Rock on!
